bibl.title: Blinding as a Means of Becoming Invisible. Reflections on the Context of P.Oxy. LVIII. 3931.
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LVIII, 3931 (= LDAB 30769). - The Editio Princeps and the Question of Context. - Ἐπιπορεύομαι: ""I Shall Press Hard"" or ""I Travel Forth"". - A New Interpretation of P.Oxy. 3931. - Final Thoughts on the Context of Invisibility. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Richard L. Phillips, Blinding as a Means of Becoming Invisible. Reflections on the Context of P.Oxy. LVIII. 3931.

P. Oxy. LVIII, 3931 (= LDAB 30769). - The Editio Princeps and the Question of Context. - Ἐπιπορεύομαι: ""I Shall Press Hard"" or ""I Travel Forth"". - A New Interpretation of P.Oxy. 3931. - Final Thoughts on the Context of Invisibility. - Avec résumé en anglais.
